TopicTitle: How do i seperate then fire stages designed as Missiles/Bombs

Articles.Content: I don\'t suppose someone can help me figure out how to separate a stage and then launch it as a missile for aircraft such as those in the C7 pack?
Add it to a decoupler, preferably a radial one, then add a solid rocket to it. Press the '+' button on the stage list in the VAB and drag and drop your rockets to a new stage for each rocket.

Speaking seriously, I was hit by my rocket too... two or three times. But generally rocket is much lighter and much faster than your ship, and cannot \'come back around\'. If this is not the case -- try to go slowly to let the rocket fly ahead.

If you want an engine to be activatable after separation, add this to .cfg:

ActivatesEvenIfDisconnected = True
